original_text: I feared the anger and wrath of the Lord, for he was angry enough with you to destroy you. But again the Lord listened to me.
korean_text: 여호와께서 심히 분노하사 너희를 멸하려 하셨으므로 내가 두려워하였노라 그러나 여호와께서 그 때에도 내 말을 들으셨고

sentences.original_text: I feared the anger and wrath of the Lord
for he was angry enough with you
But again the Lord listened to me
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 주께서 다시 나의 말을 들어주셨다
